channel.title: Whonix/Qubes - Windows Networking Help (will even pay)
channel.description:
I have spent days trying to figure this out and I am calling for help. I need to set up windows 10 going through whonix (in qubes)
I can get windows 10 to work through a normal conneciton eg. sys-firewall
Once I change to sys-whonix it falls apart
I followed instructions to change the windows IP to:
## increment last octet of IP address on additional workstations IP address 10.152.152.50 Subnet netmask 255.255.192.0 Default gateway 10.152.152.10 Preferred DNS server 10.152.152.10
not working
Can anybody help - I am even willing to pay for freelance work

item.title: Whonix/Qubes - Windows Networking Help (will even pay)
item.dc:creator: whoisnick
item.description:
I have spent days trying to figure this out and I am calling for help.
I need to set up windows 10 going through whonix (in qubes)

I can get windows 10 to work through a normal conneciton eg. sys-firewall

Once I change to sys-whonix it falls apart

I followed instructions to change the windows IP to:

increment last octet of IP address on additional workstations

IP address 10.152.152.50
Subnet netmask 255.255.192.0
Default gateway 10.152.152.10
Preferred DNS server 10.152.152.10

not working

Can anybody help - I am even willing to pay for freelance work

Read full topic
